text: I agree with Eric I think a Rust REPL would be welcome. Sometimes I just want to hack at some basic syntax without my IDE lighting up with red errors

elements.text: I agree with Eric I think a Rust REPL would be welcome. Sometimes I just want to hack at some basic syntax without my IDE lighting up with red errors

text: I have seen Haskellers doing something similar using this <https://github.com/ndmitchell/ghcid> without relying on a notebook or a REPL. Wouldn't this be sufficient for Rust?
